Theresa Hak Kyung Cha, Still from Permutations, 1976. 16mm film; black and white, silent, 10 min. Gift of the Theresa Hak Kyung Cha Memorial Foundation.

Theresa Hak Kyung Cha: Multiple Offerings

Opens January 24, 2026

Discover the inventive, playful, and meditative works of groundbreaking artist Theresa Hak Kyung Cha. Gathering over one hundred artworks and archival materials from across her short but prolific career, as well as select loans of works by Cha and other artists, the exhibition highlights Cha’s practice while also situating her work within a constellation of other artists for whom she has long been a lodestar. Learn more→
